mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_history (user_id, sent_human_message) VALUES (#{user_id}, FALSE) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sent_human_message = FALSE;

INSERT INTO login_history (user_id, sent_human_message) SELECT u.user_id, 0 FROM user u WHERE DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(u.login_date, INTERVAL 3 MONTH), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= CURDATE() ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sent_human_message = 0;
